svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Participation of women in purchase decisions, 2016
Percentage of currently married women aged 15-49 who say that they alone or jointly have a say in major household
Women participating in major purchase decisions (% of women 15-49)
Source: World Bank, World Bank – WDI
